refbody.section: Launch Dialog Nibelung StudDB installer and follow instructions on your screen to install the software.

section.note: You will need operating system administrator privileges to install Dialog Nibelung StudDB. Day-to-day operations can and should be performed by other users.

Dialog Nibelung StudDB has both runtime and install time dependencies: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 Client Profile and Windows Installer 4.5. These will be installed as necessary if your computer lacks them. An internet connection is required if these dependencies have to be downloaded.
Dialog Nibelung StudDB online documentation is supplied in PDF format. You will need Adobe Acrobat Reader or other PDF reader to view the documentation.
